short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix English by preserving your writing style.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you fix English text instantly using ChatGPT. Simply select any text, right-click, and choose "Fix English" to get a corrected version.

Features:
- Works with any text on any website
- Integrates with your OpenAI API key
- Supports various text input fields
- Real-time grammar correction
- Preserves original text style
- Works with social media platforms

How to use:
1. Install the extension
2. Click the extension icon and enter your OpenAI API key
3. Select any text you want to fix
4. Right-click and choose "Fix English"
5. The text will be automatically corrected by preserving your writing style

Privacy & Security:
- Your OpenAI API key is stored securely in your browser
- No data is stored on our servers
- Text is processed directly through OpenAI's API
- All communications are encrypted

Requirements:
- Chrome browser
- OpenAI API key

Note: This extension requires an OpenAI API key to function. You can get one at https://platform.openai.com/
